250b6('bum): dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bco ma ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
250b7('bum): 'byor nga shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas chu'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
250b8('bum): 'byor da shi nad tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas mye'i khams kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
251a1('bum): tsam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rlung gi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
251a2('bum): thaga' sum pa/ rab 'byor shin kya rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gas 'a pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i srad du bdag kun tu mtha mas pas rlung gi khams can tu mtha mas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
251a3('bum): kyis bka' stsamang pa/ mtha' las 'das pastong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gas yang po/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' mas pa'i slad du nam mthams kun tu mtha' yas bram
251a4('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam ba/ rab 'byor gi ning tu rnam par dag panyi phyir ro// gsal dang/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i srad du bdag tu tu mnam yas pas nam mtha'i khams kun tu mtha' mas pa rnam par/ 
251a5('bum): dag pa lags pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mtha'alas 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa spong pa'i phyir ro// gsolang ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' la
251a6('bum): pa'i slang du rnam par shes pa'i 'ams kun tu mtha' bar// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du bdag kun tu mtha' la
251a7('bum): bas rnam par shes pa'i khams kun tu mtha' las pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsasang ba/ mtha' las 'das pa sngo pa nyid rang thog ma dang thu ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gas
251a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mthar yas pa'i slang dungam rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsa'u su mang thu/ rab 'byor ba zhinang du rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsamang la/ bcom ldan la chu
251b1('bum): ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas ma rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
251b2('bum): phyir ro// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i srad du 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bku' spel dra bya/ rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// 
251b3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang
251b4('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa kun tu ma tha' yas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
251b5('bum): shinang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas rnam par shes pa kun tu/ mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
251b6('bum): su lang pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du mying dang gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'o bras tho tsam

257b5('bum): shi nang tu dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i/ slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas gzugs myed pa'i snyoms/ par 'jug pakun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags

260a1('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga shi nang tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshu rol

260a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gal byang rgyu sems pa'i theg pa pa ni rigs kyi kyi'am rigs kyi bu mo de thabs myi mabs pas/ shes rab kyi rom tu phyin bya 'odas dmyigs pa'i rdul du 'byigs bgyid ban/ shes rab kyi

260b1('bum): rlom sems su byed na/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas rlom sems su byed cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la chags pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog du 'byind to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ring/ 
260b2('bum): du spong ngo // rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstanang la/ chags pa dang
260b3('bum): ma chags pa de dag kyang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'di skad ces smras so// nga ma dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi

261a1('bum): 'du shes na chags pa'o// myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du

261b1('bum): chags pa'o// ma rig pa spong po zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// 'du byed stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o// mying dang gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba ma ru/

263a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi dmyigs pa'i tshul du sems dang po bskyeng pa nas nye bar bzung ba nas/ sbyin pa'am ma du phyin pal spyod na chags pa'o// tshul khrims kyi ma tsham / 
263a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod na chags pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba na chags pa'o// shes rab
263a3('bum): kyi mang tu phyin pa ma spyod na chags pa'o// nang stong pa nyid la spyod chags pa'o// kyi snang pa nyid la spyon nags pa'o// phyi gang pa nyid sa myong na chags pa'o// ga pa nyi rdzong banyings spyon chags ra// 
263a4('bum): che pa spang ba zhid pa spyod na chags par// dan dam pastong pa nyid la spyod nachags pa'o// 'du bya stong pa nyid sa myod na nags pa'o// chus dra slong panyi sa spyod can pa'o// man sa 'as pang
263a5('bum): spyong na chags pa'o// thog ya dang tha ma myed pa stong pazhir la skyedan/ chags pa'o// der bamyed pa stong ba da la spyod na chags pa'o// bzhin nga ma ning ma spyod dachags pa'o// rnamathams kyid srung / 
263a6('bum): nyid ma spyod na chags pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyinatshogs pa'o// myi dmyigs pa song pa nyid la skyon na chags pam// 'dzin sa myeng pa song pa nyid la spyong na chags pam// rngam ning spong 'i ched
263a7('bum): na chags par// das pa byung ba'i rngan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o// ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod nachags pa'o// yang dag par mangs pa rnamams spyod tshogs pa'o// rdzu nus gi rkang parna
263a8('bum): mi myang na chags pa'o// dang po rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// khyong chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam man mas brgyad pa ma spyod na chags kyim// macagam pa'i bdon pa rnams la spongs
263b1('bum): chags pa'o// sa ma gzhanamapas spyod na chags par// tshad byed pa rnams sa spyod na / gzugs myed nga thams par 'jug pa rnams pa spyod nachags 'o// rnam pa pa rnamapa
263b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i goms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smod pa skyed pa la spyod na chags pa'o// mngon pa shes pa rnams la sring
263b3('bum): na mas sa gyun mams kyi rnams sa byang // na gshegs pa na rnams sa spyang na gas par / pas pa ga
263b4('bum): bang ma chags bachen pa spyod nachags nags par/ sapa/ rgyung du zhugs pa'i
263b5('bum): sa / ma bya pa mas pa ma pa'i 'dus sus sa ltung sa zung
263b6('bum): kyim shes pa pa masapa sa med da sa nga / napa
264a1('bum): rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhe bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'das pa'i chos la rnams la 'das pa'i chos rnams zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos shes bya bar 'du shes
264a2('bum): na chags pa'o// gang lta byung ba tshas rnams la ltar byung bas rgyas zhes bya bar 'du shes pa skyed do// meng ldan pashar 'i chu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po babs sabs pa shes rab kyi rom tu sbyin
264a3('bum): ma byung ba ni 'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa'i ba lang du nig sbyin ni// 'di la ni sbyin pa zhig sbyin no// sbyin pa 'di la bu zhig sbyin non 'ang/ bdag gis tshul rnams zhig srung ngo // tshul khrims 'di la bu zhig sru ngan / 
264a4('bum): bdag gis ni bcod pa zhes sgom mo// bzod pa 'di lta bu nig man 'am/ bdag gson brtsor 'grus nas / 'dus 'dis bzhin na/ bdag gis na 'amam ga
264a5('bum): ma mam kyi par gzhag go/ bamam gtan 'di la bu zhig sam par gzhag go/ ne'ang/ bdag gis ni shes pa / shes rab 'di lta du nig skam po zhebadag gis ni cho/ 
264a6('bum): nams zhig bskyed do// bsod nams 'di la bu 'i skyed do// bsod rnams 'di tsam zhig bskyed do// bdag gis ni byang chu sems pa ldan mye pas chung ba gyi'o// bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasas
264a7('bum): pa bya/ sa sa mas can sas kyi smyid kyi bya / ga gis ma pas mams med pa / na
264a8('bum): sa sem 'a che ma nga myed pa ma gags tha ni ga 'dzi
265a1('bum): stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong / 
265a2('bum): pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / 
265a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / dran pa che bar gzhag pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par spong
265a4('bum): ba rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / dbang po rnams su 'du shes pa dang / stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 
265a5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang / 'phaganyes pa'i bden pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / bsam gtan rnam sa su 'du shes pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / 
265a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tharang pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par tharang pa'i sgo
265a7('bum): slong ba nyid dang / mtshan ma skyed pa dang smon ba skyed pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / mngon pa shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzinang rnams su 'dushes pa dang / gdus kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa
265a8('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su 'du shes pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang / byams pa chen por 'du shes pa dang / snying rje
265b1('bum): chen por 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su 'du shes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rag du 'du shes nas/ 
265b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te/ gcig tu rtu lang nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg
265b3('bum): ba pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis chags pa ste/ chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/ chags pa myed pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni ke'u shig
265b4('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo myi nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhi na yongs su sngor myi nus so// 'du shes kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
265b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myig/ gi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i rang bzhin yongs/ su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
265b6('bum): lce'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nu sa so// gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// smra'i
265b7('bum): rang bzhin yongs su snga bar myi nus so// rdo'i rang bzhin yongs yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ra'i rang bzhin yongs su so bar myi nus so// reg gi rang bzhin mongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chos kyi yang ban ni yongs su rdzo
265b8('bum): bar myi nus so// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
266a1('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myig gi 'dus
266a2('bum): 'du te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
266a3('bum): bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin mongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i ra
266a4('bum): bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
266a5('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo ba ra myi nus so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
266a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mye'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su spro bar
266a7('bum): myi nus so// rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ma rig
266a8('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'du byed kyi rang bzhin bzhed yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mying dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su
266b1('bum): sngo bar myi nus so// skye mched drug gi rang bzhin ni yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// reg pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshor ba'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// sred pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi
266b2('bum): nus so// len pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// srid pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// skye ba'i rang bzhin ni yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rga shi'i rang bzhin ni yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
266b3('bum): sbyinang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngor bar myi nus so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi
266b4('bum): nus so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i rang babazhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
266b5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// nang stong pa nyid kyi/ rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi nga bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
266b6('bum): rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
266b7('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus s+ho// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang
266b8('bum): bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// don pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang bzhin spong sa
267a1('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myi dmyigs
267a2('bum): tho stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dngos po myed pa'i 'o// 
267a3('bum): pa nyidi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dran panye bar gnag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin mangs su spro bar myi nus so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin mangs su snga bar myi nus so// rdzu 'phrul
267a4('bum): gi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su spro bar myi nus so// dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// stobs rnam ngas kyi rang bzhin yongs su spro bar myi nus so// byang chub kyi yam
267a5('bum): mag rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 'phags pa/ 'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bamyi nus so// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo
267a6('bum): bar myi nus so// bsam gtan rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// tshad myed pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin
267a7('bum): yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rnam par thar
267a8('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ting nge 'dzinang rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su
267b1('bum): sngo bar myi nus so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo
267b2('bum): bar myi nus so// ma so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// byams pa chen po'i rang bzhin yongs sngo bar myi nus so// sring rje chen po'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi num sa/ sbyin te/ 
267b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongasu/ 
267b4('bum): sngo bar myi nus so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// 
267b5('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su spro bar myi nus so/ te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su sngo bar myi nus so// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
267b6('bum): gzhan smrig blan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa bsad tam// yang dag par bskul sas/ yang ngas pa basbyong das/ yang ga pa ga gyu/ nga dag pa'i
267b7('bum): ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o// yang dag par skul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro bskyed par bya'i// yang dag par dga' ba bskyod par bya'o// de yang ci nas kyang sbyin du pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod
267b8('bum): ba'i ma/ bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i rtsa/ bdag ni tshul rloms kyi pha ro molang tu phyin pa 'i na
268a1('bum): zado zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol pa
268a2('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
268a3('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam ngar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / nang stong/ 
268a4('bum): pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar na rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi
268a5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyi nang / stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stong pa nyid stong pa
268a6('bum): lnga spyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / chen po stong po nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chen po stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
268a7('bum): thudrug ni don dam pa stang ba nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'dus byas song pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus byas song ba nyid la spyod ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba / 
268a8('bum): 'dus ma byas sto ze snyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong sa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mtha' las 'das pa
268b1('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni thog ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
268b2('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod do// 
268b3('bum): zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
268b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bdag ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do/ zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la
268b5('bum): skyong ngo zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa spong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rnam par rton
268b6('bum): bar myi 'gyur ba dang ngo bo nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dngos
268b7('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog pa
268b8('bum): myi 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni
269a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dbang po rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / stobs rnas/ 
269a2('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog
269a3('bum): par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni 'phags pa'i lam yani lag brgyad pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
269a4('bum): mi spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni baphags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do zhe/ ngas bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan nangs la spyod pa'i cha/ bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la spyong do zhes bya
269a5('bum): bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni tshad myed pa rnams la spong ngo zhes bya bar rnarma/ par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par ru
269a6('bum): pa rnams la spyong pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par bar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgya
269a7('bum): ma myong nga zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par gyi 'gyur ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul spyod pa'i ma/ bdag ni mthadzar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jun pa dgus spyong rngo zhes bya ba ma
269a8('bum): par rig par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par 'a pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang ston pa myed pa la skyong po'i tshe/ bdag ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myang ba nga blan pa myeng pa ma srung ngom
269b1('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod pa'i tshe
269b2('bum): bdag ni ting nge 'dzind rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / de
269b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni myi 'jigs
269b4('bum): pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi/ 
269b5('bum): 'gyur ba dang / byams pa chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni byams// pa chen po la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni snying rje chen po la spyod do zhes
269b6('bum): bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad la spyod po'i tshe/ bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rgyund tu/ 
269b7('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong / 
269b8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do// zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / 
270a1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni rang byang chub la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par/ 
270a2('bum): rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par myi 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la spyod pa'i
270a3('bum): bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod do zhes bya bar rtog par myi 'gyur ba de yang dag par bstanang bar bya'o// yang dag par skul bar bya/ yang dag par spro ba skyed par bya ste/ de ltar spyod pa'i rigs/ 
270a4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos gzhan bla na myeng pa yang dag par rdzogs/ dpa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstanang bar bya'o// yang dag paraskul bar bya'o// yang dag par spro bskyed par bya'o// yang ngas
270a5('bum): par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o// de yang dag par bstand pa de la dang / yang dag par bskul ba de dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed pa de/ dang / yang dag par dga' bar bskyed par bya ba des
270a6('bum): gzhan yang dag par stond cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' ba byed pa'i tshe/ rma byung b.ri myi 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul bas bsku
270a7('bum): ba yin te/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// // bam po// 
270a8('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
270b1('bum): la chags pa dang / ma chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag stond pa legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de lta bas na khyod la chags pa dang / ma chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang 'phra ba dag bstan par byas/ de dag
270b2('bum): shi nang tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bstanang par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga bcom ldan 'das la phyir nya nang // bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di
270b3('bum): skad ces bka' stsalang te/ rab 'byor nga 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
270b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar ming la byed na/ rab 'byor ci tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de sring du chags pa'o// nang yang 'das ma byon ba dang / ngas byung ba'i dri bzhin gshegs pa
270b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ dam pa'i d+ha/ sa gnas pa'i bar gi dag ba'i rtsa ba gang ji skad pa de dag chen
270b6('bum): cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing yid la byas nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byorang ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// gang
270b7('bum): yung de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang / de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang / 
270b8('bum): chub tu yongs su bsngo na/ rab 'byord ci tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag ni mtshan mar yid la byed pa ma yin te/ de bzhin
271a1('bum): gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin no// gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni zab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorapa/ 
271a2('bum): chos thams cad rang bzhin gis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor dade/ 
271a3('bum): ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni ma byas mngon par ma byas pa ste/ de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs rgyas
271a4('bum): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor dade ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/ chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zang ngo // rab 'byorang chos kyi rang bzhin
271a5('bum): gcig po gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin no// gang rang bzhin ma yin ba de ni ma byas pa'o// gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'dum byas pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sa/ 
271a6('bum): dpa' chen po chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'du ma byas pa/ shes na nags pa'i 'durnam pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no// rkang ma nga/ bcom ldan 'a
271a7('bum): gyis rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa rtogs pa dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsamang pa/ rab 'byorang de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa ni sum kyang ma mthong ma thos martogs pa'i rnam pan
271a8('bum): zhes pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro// gam med pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi la rob tu phyin pa ni mam gyis kyi khyang ba'i// tsam ldan 'das kyis tshan 'dulang ba/ rang 'byor
271b1('bum): de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes pa'o// gzugs kyis ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// 'du shes kyis ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so myig gis ma shes so
271b2('bum): rna bas ma shes so// snas ma shes so// lces ma shes so// lus kyis ma shes so// yid kyis ma shes so// gzugs kyis ma shes so// sgras ma shes so// dris ma shes so// ros mi shes so// reg gis ma
271b3('bum): shes so// chos kyis ma shes so// myig gi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// sna'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma shes so// lus kyi rnam
271b4('bum): par shes pas ma shes so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas ma shes so// dmyig gi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sa ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lce'i
271b5('bum): 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pas mazhes yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma shes so// myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma shes so// rnam pa'i 'dus te reg
271b6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma shes so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma shes
271b7('bum): yid kyi 'dres te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas ma shes so// sa'i khams kyis ma shes so// chu'i khams kyis ma shes so// me'i khams kyis ma shes so// rlung gi khams kyis ma shes so// nam mkha'i
271b8('bum): khams kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis ma shes so// ma rig pas ma shes so// 'du byed kyis ma shes so// rnam par shes pas ma shes so// mying dang gzugs kyis ma shes so// 
272a1('bum): skye mched drug gis ma shes so// reg pas ma shes so// tshor bas ma shes so// sred pas ma shes so// lend pas ma shes so// srid pas ma shes so// skye bas ma shes so// rga shis ma shes shes so// 
272a2('bum): sbyi nad pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// bsam rten
272a3('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas ma shes so// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// stong pa nyid stong
272a4('bum): pa nyid kyis ma shes so// chen po stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi sa ma shes so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// 
272a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// thog ma da/ nga tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dor ba myed pastong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma shes
272a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// ngo bo nyid
272a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma shes so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma shes so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma shes so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa
272a8('bum): rnams kyis ma shes so// dbang po rnams kyis ma shes so// stobs rnams kyis ma shes song / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis ma shes so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma shes so// 'phags
272b1('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams kyis ma shes so// bsam gtan rnams kyis ma shes so// tshad myed pa rnams kyis ma shes so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis
272b2('bum): ma shes so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus ma shes so// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas ma shes so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes
272b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis ma shes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis ma shes so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ma shes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rgyas
272b4('bum): me shes so// byams pa chen pos ma shes so// snying rje chen pos ma shes so/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus ma shes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
272b5('bum): 'bras bus ma shes so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus ma shes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rang byang chub kyis man/ sa so// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis ma shes so// rnam pa thos/ 
272b6('bum): cing mkhyend pa nyid kyis ma shes so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rapa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
272b7('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor byed pa po myi dmyigs pa'i
272b8('bum): gam 'byed de bzhin du gzugs kyi dmyigs pa dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du shes myi dmyigs pa dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa dang / myig myi dmyigs pa dang / 
273b1('bum): dmyigs pa dang / sred pa myi dmyigs pa dang / lend pa myi dmyigs pa dang / srid pa myi nga myigs pa dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rga shi myi dmyigs pa dang / sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 
273b2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi
273b3('bum): dmyigs pa dang / sarab kyi ldang du phyin pa kyi dmyigs pa dang / mthong ba nyid kyi dmyigs pa dang / kyi mang ba nyid kyi dmyigs pa dang / byi nang stong ba nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / song nanang srong ba'i
273b4('bum): dmyigs pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / don da/ ma pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / 
273b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong / pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs
273b6('bum): pa dang / chos thams thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / go mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi gyis
273b7('bum): pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi dmyigs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba myi dmyigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
273b8('bum): rkang pa myi dmyigs pa dang / dbang po myi dmyigs pa dang / stobs myi dmyigs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden/ 
274a1('bum): pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dmyigs pa dang / dgra
274a2('bum): pa nyid myi dmyigs pa dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi dmyigs pa dang / rnam pa thams
274b1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug sngal ces bya ba/ 
274b2('bum): 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi
274b3('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do// gal te tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
274b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdugs ral zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dal spyong ngo // gal te tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed
274b5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyo na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
274b6('bum): rten gang rtog pa 'ang myi rtag pa'am 'di' 'am phru gsul ba 'am bdag gam pa ga skye ba'am/ drug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba na bu char bskyeng ngo // gas du shes sa myi spyod sa nas rab kyi
274b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes rgya gces bye ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi ming du phrin dpa la spyod do// gas 'du shes pa zhes rgyapa'am sdug bsngal zhes bya
274b8('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes sdug ces bya ba 'am
275a1('bum): rdzu pa mi thug pa gyu 'i she 'byed sa kyi la kyi da/ 
275a2('bum): da grags rnam pa ben pas kyi spyong nags pa kyi sa tu sbyi pas sna // na pa ben pa pa smra ma rgyas ma nga kyi phyi ma
275b1('bum): 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te myig la myig la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
275b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
275b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya
275b4('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// nga de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'amang sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi
275b5('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig myed do// gal te rna ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes
275b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdo zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu byond pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myong ces
275b7('bum): bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am/ 
275b8('bum): myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba myed do// gal te sna la spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// gal
276a1('bum): te sna rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
276a2('bum): sna bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag
276a3('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna myed do// gal te lce la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lce rtag
276a4('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lce bdag ces
276a5('bum): bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i
276a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug spel ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lho myang ngo // gal te lus la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol pa
276a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sprul zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
276a8('bum): phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te lus bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
276b1('bum): rolang du phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus myed do// gal te yid la myi/ 
276b2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gas te yid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdugasngal zhes bya bar myi stso
276b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha la tu phyi nang pa la skyong ngo // gal te yid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bye bar
276b4('bum): smod no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i hU~M dar zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtog pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sreg par 'gyur 'di/ 
276b5('bum): lci bu'i yid myed do// gal te gzugs la myi spyod na shes rab kyi rna rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs rtag ces bya pa 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
276b6('bum): la spyod do// gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ga/ thugs bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na zhes
276b7('bum): rab kyi phra ro lang du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'de ba 'om sku
276b8('bum): sbal ba 'am bdagu gam bdag myeng ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi rtag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed do// gal te sA la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal ste m+b+ha can ces bya ba'am myi rtag ces
277a1('bum): cacag/ bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya/ 
277a2('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sgra sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am
277a3('bum): ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra myed do// gal te dri la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
277a4('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya/ 
277a5('bum): zar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dri/ sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi
277a6('bum): rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am stug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'amasdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dri myed do// gal te rol myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ro rtag ces
277a7('bum): bam myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ro bde zhi bya ba 'am sdug sprul zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal nye ro bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces/ 
277a8('bum): byi bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi mi'i mang du phyind pa la spyong ngo do// gal te ro sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir ni na/ gang nag pa'am myi rtag pa'am bde ba 'amathun
277b1('bum): sngal ba 'am bdag gas bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ro myang ngo // gal te reg la gyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rom na byin dpa la myong ngo // gal 'i reg can ces bya ba 'am myi rta gtses bya ba m+b+ha ts+tsha/ 
277b2('bum): shes can kyi pa'i mang du na pa la spyong ngo // gas te ga zhes bya ba 'am thugs sa ces bya bar myi spyong na shes kyi pa ma tu phyin pa la byung // gas ma rgya ba ma bdag rtse ces byab kyi slong ma nas
277b3('bum): mang na pa ma byang / ga na ce bya ba'as kyi hrug ces bya gyi myeng na nas kyi rim khyen pa sa nga / ga pa gyi ga pa ma ba ga gnas kya la / 
277b4('bum): ba'am gyi sdug par 'gyur ba des bu'i rig myed do// gas nas pa kyi / ngan nyes rab kyi pa mang tu phyin pa stong ngo // ga po rjes nyin ces / 'am myeta ces byab kyi spyang nas kyim mang bye / 
277b5('bum): gas te rgyam bde zhes bya ba'am sdug lngal zhes bya bar myi spyong ma zhes 'a'o kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyong // gal te chos bdag ces bya ro/ bdag myed ces bya bar gyi myong na shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyin pa la stongango // 
277b6('bum): gral te chos drug ces bya ba 'am gyi sdug ces bya byar gyi sring na shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag par 'gyur me pa'am su gsal ba'am 'dag gas ngan myed pa 'am sdug pa'am
277b7('bum): kyi sug par 'a ba des su gyis myo nga // phyog gi rnam pa shes pas myo sa kyi sa myed pa la spyod // phyin nas pa partag ces kyi ma mye kyi rgyam cu rgya nas
277b8('bum): byinang pa la sbyong ro// gal te phyog gi rnam pa sa shes pa pa shes bya ba 'am mug bsngal zhes bya bar myi myong na shes rab kyi la romang du phyind pa la spong ngo // gal te tsug mi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am bdan myong ces bya bar gyi myongs
278a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug
278a2('bum): sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig gi rnam par shes pa myeng ngo // gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nag
278a3('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa/ 
278a4('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang ba la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes na shes rab rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
278a5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba/ 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyu/ ra ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa
278a6('bum): rkyong ngo // gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phy-i nad pa la spyod do// gal te sA'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi srung na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhal te sA
278a7('bum): rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol rgyu pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
278a8('bum): phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal pa
278b1('bum): 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i rnam par shes pa myed do// nam sa lce'i rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang / 
278b2('bum): pal spyod do// / gal che lce'i rnam par shes pa rta ga ces bya ba'i mye rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
278b3('bum): nal lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gags te sde'i rnam pa nas pa 'dag ces bya ba 'am bdag kyi rjes bya bar gyi zung sa zhes rab kyis mngan byin rnas la myong ngo // gas te sde'i rnam pa nas bamug ces bya ba'am kyi sdug ces rna
278b4('bum): gyi myong na shes pa kyi pa ming du phyind pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen dgang can pa'as khyenas pa ma 'a pa'am zugs dganas 'ad bye pa ma sun pa sa myi drug par 'gyur 'i dag du'i
278b5('bum): ra gyi skying na nopo kyi sa kyid pam / nas sa pacu sa bya chu gyur/ kyi pas nga na/ #
278b6('bum): myiphyag pa 'am 'ad pa 'am thug bsngal ba'ab bdag gas padag myeng pa' ma thug pa 'am kyi thug par 'gyung ba ma gro chu'i kyirnam pa gas kyi kyang // nas meng kyirnam nas pas kyi grong mnam rgya rgyam mang tu phyin pa
279a1('bum): sa spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi
279a2('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces
279a3('bum): bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi
279a4('bum): sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa kyi spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag
279a5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te/ 
279a6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myig go 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod man
279a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig gi 'dus te/ 
279a8('bum): rig pa myed do// gal te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// rgal
279b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
279b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde
279b3('bum): ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta ba'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
279b4('bum): gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa bde ba 'am zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na
279b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te/ 
279b6('bum): reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am
279b7('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi
279b8('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te/ 
280a1('bum): reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
280a2('bum): pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa myed do// gal te lus te reg
280a3('bum): pa li myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus te reg pa bde zhes
280a4('bum): bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
280a5('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i
280a6('bum): bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed ces bya ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed de/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
280a7('bum): phyinang pa la spyad do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal
280a8('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag ce bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid
280b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sprul ba 'am bdag gam/ 
280b2('bum): bdag myed ces bya ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed do// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
280b3('bum): gral ba myig gi 'dus te na snga las kyu chen char bdag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya ba gyi myong / nams kyi ma na kying tshal rkyong ngo // ga myig gi 'dus che reg sa las byung ba'i
280b4('bum): shes bya ba la lug pa shes bya ngan/ / na du su ngag sa bya ba'i ma
280b5('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod nu/ shes ra ros tu phyi na pa la stsa // gas ts+tshan gi 'dus te ga thams byung ba'i rnangasasu gces bya ba 'am gyi mug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rin
280b6('bum): ang byin pa'i snang // de 'i phyir zhin/ gang ga pa 'am ni rtag pa 'ang 'a ba ma thug sprul pa 'chi ba shA gas pa mye pa'am thug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur 'i nga la du'i sbyin / 
280b7('bum): sa pa las byu spyod du// rten pa ga pa nga kyil kyi skyon zhe kyi sa kyi / 
280b8('bum): tshim tha rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po la spyong ngo // gal den pa'i 'dus de reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba 'ing zhes bya ba'am sug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes can
281a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i
281a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bstug ces bya ba'am gyi sdug ces bya bar myi mngon shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am rmyi rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sdug stsal la/ 
281a3('bum): thangag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'om myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ros
281a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa
281a5('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya'o// ra myi spyod na/ shes rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sA 'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag
281a6('bum): ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyo
281a7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myeng ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// 
281a8('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro gang tu phyin pa la myong ngo // gsonyi sgo'i 'dus ni reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rta ga ces bya ba 'am rgyan gces bya ba gyi
281b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// 
281b2('bum): gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
281b3('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag
281b4('bum): myed pa 'am/ stug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las pa'i tshor ba la myi spyod na
281b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba lam myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang
281b6('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba/ bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te/ 
281b7('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba
281b8('bum): 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
282a1('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa/ 
282a2('bum): la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
282a3('bum): ba bdo zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
282a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus dpe reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod ngo // de ci'i phyir/ 
282a5('bum): zhen gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am stunasbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
282a6('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba myed do// gal te sa'i khams la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams cag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
282a7('bum): zil stong ngo // gal te sa'i khams pa de zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gas te ma'i khams padagaces bya na'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myo stong
282a8('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa
282b1('bum): 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am gyi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sa'i khams myed do// gal te chu'i khams la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod do// 
282b2('bum): gal te chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod // gal te chu'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
282b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams bdag ces bya ba 'om bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyong ngo // gal te tshu'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am gyi sdug ces tshabs myi spyod na/ 
282b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang du byin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am mya rtag pa 'am bde ba'am sug stsal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myeng ba 'am/ sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur
282b5('bum): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chu'i khams myed do// gag rtse'i khamasamyed do// gal te mye'i khams la gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi rolang tu phyin pa la myong ngo // gas ni rnams can cimi bya ba'am
282b6('bum): rtag ces bya bar myi spyo na/ shes rab kyi pha ro mad tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha mang du phyin pa la skying ngo // nal te mye'i khams
282b7('bum): ba ga ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar gyi spyang na/ sa N+DI pa ma phyin pa la spyod do// ga' te mo'i khams sdug ces bya ba 'am kyi sdug ces bya bar myi myong ma mang du byin pa
282b8('bum): myong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ ga rtag pa'am myi rtag pa'am bde ba'am sugasbal ba'am bdas gam bdag myed pa'am sdug pa'am myi mug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i khams myed do// gal zung gi khams ca
283a1('bum): ma spyod na zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal byung // gal rlung gi khams cag ces bya ba'am myi cag ces bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi 'o ma byed tha ma spyod // na rlung gi thams pan pa rgyan na
283a2('bum): na me bya ba 'am kyi bu ga ces bya bar gyi / shes ra pa'i mang bcan pas stong / 'i phyi zhen/ na pa mam thunaganas bdag myong
283a3('bum): la kyi rdzu pa'i snang ba sa su'i sa ltung ba/ ma
283b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// ni gral te rnam par shes pa'i khams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams bdag
283b2('bum): ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyind pa la spyong do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams sug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi skyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyo
283b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myed do// / 
283b4('bum): sas kyib yang sa sbyin pas song brag rgya / nas kyi na
283b5('bum): myong // ga'i ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba'am myi thag ces bya chu spyod na shes rab kyi ma na phyin pas spya na/ dgas man pa bde nas bya ma gyi thugs la zhes bya bar gyi grangan
283b6('bum): zhes rab kyi daros tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsasas men bdag ma rig pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab tu pa mang du byin pa la myong ngo // gas de ma rig pa skun ces
283b7('bum): tha'am kyi sdug ces bya bar myi smyon/ shes rab gyi mang tu phyin pa la spyod // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang cag pa 'am myo chog pa 'am 'a ba'am phrugasal ba'am ba na gam pa ga myed pa'am sdug ma
283b8('bum): myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ma rig pa myed // gal te 'du byed la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'aces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
284a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya
284a2('bum): bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya ba myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi
284a3('bum): rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'du byed myed do// gal te rnam par shes pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
284a4('bum): la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa ca rtag ces bya ba 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa badre zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes
284a5('bum): bye bar myi spyod na pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin nga/ pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
284a6('bum): spyong // gal te rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ 
284a7('bum): sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam par shes pa myed do// gal te mying dang gzugs la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pharo mang du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal
284a8('bum): te mying dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// kwagal te myang dang gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes pa
285a1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te reg pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
285a2('bum): spyod do// sa gal te reg pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'amamyi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am
285a3('bum): sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rig pa myed do// gal nya tshor ba la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal
285a4('bum): tsher bya drug ces bya ba'am myi nag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ sarab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // gam te tshadab nas bya ba'am srug stsal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ 
285a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gas mtshor ba 'dan ces bya ba 'am/ bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyi nang pa la spong ngo // gal te tshos
285a6('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'om myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gas/ 
285a7('bum): bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba myeng ngo // gal te sred pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
285a8('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te sreng ba bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// zhal te
285b1('bum): sbed pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi srung na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sred pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar gyi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rung rgya
285b2('bum): byin pa la byung ngo // tsan phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'am bde ba'am dugasal pa ya/ bdag gas bdag bye pa'am/ drug pa'am gyi mug pa 'chung ba de sa chu'i srang ba skye
285b3('bum): gal tshe len dpal myi spyod na pa shes rab kyi rold tu sbyin pa la spyod do// gal gyi me nad pa ca gces bya ba 'am myin ga ces bya bar myi myong na sa ra kyi pha romang tu phyin la
285b4('bum): gal te nad pa 'di nas bya ba 'am phrug sal zhes byang kyi ma mang sa
285b5('bum): spya shesapa kyi ma da pa la gyung / yang bsgrug
285b6('bum): rdo ci'i phyir zhen pa gang cag pa 'am myi rtag pa'am bde ba 'am phyag stsal pa'am/ bag gam bdag stong pa 'ang/ sun rje lam b+h+yo ga pa tshu pa de sa chu'i byin pa myed // 
285b7('bum): pas myi snad na/ shes rab kyi pa mang du byinang pa la spyod do// gas kyi meng pa cug ces bya ba 'am mye ga sa bar gyi snang su myi spo // rnam te sring pa
285b8('bum): bya ba'am smig sul zhes bya bar gyi myong na/ shes rab gyi rol tu phyin pa la myong // rgal 'i sring pa zang gisas kyi ba ma pa sa myed kyim bya'i kyi sa kyis mang du byin
286a1('bum): sus byas pa 'am/ sa gam bdag snying bya'ang phrag pa sa ni thug bya cu sa bu'i mings kyad do// sa bas dz+ha pa / 
286b1('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug sngal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rga shi myed do// gal te sbyinang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na
286b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// rtag ces bya ba 'am mya rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyind pa'i pha rol
286b3('bum): tu phyind pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes
286b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te spyinang po'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
286b5('bum): rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am stug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i spyi// nang pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa myed do// gal te tshul khrims
286b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi nang pa mo spyang do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa rtag ces bya'o// 'am/ myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol pa
286b7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rolang du phyin
286b8('bum): pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
287a1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshul/ 
287a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yar mye // gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces
287a3('bum): bya bar gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// 
287a4('bum): gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do bdag ces bya ba rnam bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
287a5('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am
287a6('bum): bdag gam bdag skyed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa myed do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol / 
287a7('bum): tu phyin pa la snang ngo // gal rje brtson 'grus kyi pha rom tu phyin pa zhag ces bya ba 'am gyi rtag ces bya bar myi spongan/ shes rab kyi pa sa tu byin pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi

287b1('bum): bar myi spyod na de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang /

287b5('bum): lung du phyin pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod rten/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong ngo // gal te sam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya bar myi spong
287b6('bum): nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ci'i phyir namagrang ha/ drug pa'am myi rnan pa'am ba ba'am sdug sal gA'am/ bdag gam bdas skyeng ba 'am thug pa'am myi drug par 'gyur/
