287b7('bum): ba de lte bu'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin
287b8('bum): thun ga ces bya ba sa gyi rtagaces bya bar myi myong na/ gas rab gyi po ro mang du phyin pa la spong nas can po rab tu ma ming tu byin pa 'ad zhes bya ba'am sdug pas la zhes bya bar myi myong na das
288a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bdag shes/ 
288a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag
288a3('bum): myong ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed do// gal te nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ 
288a4('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la/ spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba'am sdug sAl zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// 
288a5('bum): gal te nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te napa/ stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na
288a6('bum): gis rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyo du tsho phyir zhe na/ gang zhag pa'am myi dag pa 'am bde ba 'am mug sngal po 'am bdag gam bdag myong ba'am/ drug pa'am gyi sdug par 'gyur ba des bu'i la can
288a7('bum): myong ga kAgal te gyi stong ba nyid la myi spyod du/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la stong ngo // gas te kyi stong ba nyid nan ces bya ba 'am myirtag ces bya bar myi srung na pa rab kyi ma mang du phyin pa la spang ngo // 
288a8('bum): kyinangs nyid shes bya ba 'am sug du mi zhes bya bar gyiphyos/ ga 'bya ma'i tshur/ rgyagasas sa'ang kyi rgyas kyi myonan bya chos tu phyin pa/ 
288b1('bum): la spyod do/ gol to phyi stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rta gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag
288b2('bum): gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi stong pa nyid myed do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid
288b3('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa/ 
288b4('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dang la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ 
288b5('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myiHga pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam pa
288b6('bum): myong ba 'am sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyi nang stong pa nyid mye gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te spong ba zhing stong pa nyid chag
288b7('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyong ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol / 
288b8('bum): tu phyinang pa la myong ngo // gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag med ces bya bar gyi spyong mo// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myong ngo // nam tsho slong pa nyid ming ba nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/ 
289a1('bum): myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ 
289a2('bum): sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myeng ngo // sagal te chen po song pa nyid la myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chen po stong pa nyid nag ces bya ba 'am myi na
289a3('bum): ces bya bar myi myo na/ shes rab kyi pha romang du byin pa la spyong ngo // gal te chen po spong ba nying bde zhes bya ba'am sdugasbal zhes bya bar myi spong na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas cho
289a4('bum): spong ba nyid la bangag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal de chen po san na pa nying sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyong na shes ra gyi
289a5('bum): pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir pa zhe na/ gag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am/ bde ba'am sdug bsngal ba 'tsha bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'am myi sdug par 'gyur 'ad lta
289a6('bum): bu'i chen po snang ba nyid myed // dgal te don dam pa stong pa nyid la myi skyong na/ shes rab kyi pha 'o mang du phyin pa la spyong // zhal te don dam pa stong pa nyid na gces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar gyi srung na/ shes rab kyi
289a7('bum): phra rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
289a8('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
289b1('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba ji lta bu'i don dam pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ 
289b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di
289b3('bum): zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
289b4('bum): po la spyod do// gal te 'dus byas stong pa nyid stug ces bya ba 'am/ myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am
289b5('bum): bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ 
289b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rathe kyo pa mang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byas stong ba zhing
289b7('bum): de zhes bya ba 'am stug sA la zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma byos stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyong na/ rinas rab kyis ma
289b8('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus ma gyis stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar gyi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am 'deb
290a1('bum): 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'dus ma stong pa nyid myed do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
290a2('bum): pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bye ba 'am myi cag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'dzas ze stong pa nyid bde zhes bya bal
290a3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid de zhes bya ba 'am sdug pal zhes bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha romang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas te thon ma dang tha ma myeng pa stong ba nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdage myed ces bya ba gyi rlo/ 
290a4('bum): na zhes rab kyi pha rolapa tu phyind pa la spyong ngo do// gal te thog ma dang tham myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba'am myi sug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha romang tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mas
290b1('bum): 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa'i
290b2('bum): la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dor
290b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pa la spyong // gal te dor ba myed bya stong ba nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myong ces bya bar myi spyod
290b4('bum): nu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngor nga ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
290b5('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa la nam myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed
290b6('bum): do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol
290b7('bum): tu sbyinang pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rosang na byin pa la spyong ngo // nas kyi rang bzhin myong po nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am gyi
290b8('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
291a1('bum): gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myi spyod/ 
291a2('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya
291a3('bum): 'am stug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod do// gal te chos thams cad stong ba nyid bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyong ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
291a4('bum): gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zho na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'am sdug stsal ba 'am
291a5('bum): bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyurab de lta bu'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed do// gal te rang ni/ mtshan nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
291a6('bum): gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tug ces bya ba ma myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ring gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ba zhis bya ba 'am sdug sbal zhes bya bar myi spyongs/ 
291a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid spong ba bdag ces bya ba'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi stong na shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba zhid
291a8('bum): sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gas bdag myeng pa 'am su
291b1('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang gi mtshan nyid myed do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myis dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
291b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la myi spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag
291b3('bum): myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
291b4('bum): drug pa 'am myi rtag pa bum sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag med pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mying dgas pa stong pa nyid myed do// gal te dngos po myeng ba stong pa nyid ma skye
291b5('bum): spyong ma nyes rab kyi pa yong tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas po myang bsrung pa nyid rtagaces bya ba'am myican ces bya spyo zhes mang du phyi nang pa la myong ngo // nam che ma na
291b6('bum): pa nyid de shes bya ba 'a sdug pa 'i zhes ba phyin/ ma byi pa sa sbyong / la sa sa kyi na
291b7('bum): pa la spyod do// ga sa pa nyid bsnang ba nyid sa d+hA sa nu ra/ kyi ma'am
291b8('bum): 'am phrugasal ba las pagagam pa byed pa la jug pa 'am kyi thug par 'gyur ba sa tshu ma 'i byed pa nga pazhi byed do// ga ba ning 'argya gyu ma ma na phyid pa myong // 
292a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
292a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stug ces bya ba
292a3('bum): 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug
292a4('bum): 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid myed do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dngos pa
292a5('bum): myeng ba'i ngo bo nying stong pa nyid dag ces bya ba 'am myenaces bya bar myi spyod du/ shes rabagyi pa mang du phyin pa da// gas te dngas po myed pa mdzan ning stong pa nyid bde zhes
292a6('bum): bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi po ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid bdag ces bya bar myi sbyor na 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi
292a7('bum): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
292a8('bum): ngo ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po myed
292b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid myed do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod
292b2('bum): nanashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa zhe
292b3('bum): gzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am myi tshig ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyong ngo // dri rje'i phy-i
292b4('bum): zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug stsal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba delta bu'i dran pa nye bar ga 'gra pa rnams myed do// gam te yang ngag pani
292b5('bum): spong ba rnams sa kyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyinang/ pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams teg ces bya/ ba'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi ma mamang du byin
292b6('bum): pa la spyod do// g.yo te yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag
292b7('bum): ces bya ba'am myi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag phur mong na rnams sdug ces bya ba'am gyi mug ces bya bar gyi spyong ni/ namarab kyi pha ma tu phyin pa la spong ngo // 
292b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am badre ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed rnga ba 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i yang dag par spong ba rnams myeng ngo // gas nu bru
293a1('bum): tsamagagi na pa rnams la myi spyod nag shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal de rdzu/ 
293a2('bum): 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba ni 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dag ces bya ba 'am myi dag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
293a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya ba'i myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa'i/ 
293a4('bum): bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'amabadag gam bdag myed pa 'am stug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul Na gi rkang pa myed do// dgal te dbang po rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
293a5('bum): spong ngo // gal te dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba'am myi spyod su/ te shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa la skyed do/ b+hagal te 'ang po rnam bde zhes bya ba'am sdug snga'o zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi 'ang
293a6('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag mying ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi ho ro lung tu phyi nang po la spyod do// gal te dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya ba myi spyod na/ 
293a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dbang po myed do// 
293a8('bum): gal te stobs rnams la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi ye cho mang tu byi nang pa la spyong ngo // zham te mo
293b1('bum): rnams zed zhes bya ba 'am sug thal zhes bya bar myi myod gas rab gyi kyi ma sa byin pal gyi grag pa 'i sebs rnams pa ces byab 'am das kyi chos bya myi myong / yang
293b2('bum): ngas gas grobs rnams cug ces bya babs kyi sus ces bya ba spyod // zhes ba kyi byin pa myong / na/ ma kyi ma lugs pos
293b3('bum): kam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'im myi sdug par 'gyur 'di lta bu'i spobs myed do// gal te byang chub kyi yis sde kun ma grol gyi spyod na// nas rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ma spyod do// gal chung tshun gyi man lan rna/ 
293b4('bum): tig ces b+ha ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar gyi smranam byin pa la spyod do/ kyinal lun sa rnam run
293b5('bum): 'am gyi sdug pa 'am 'gyur ba des pa'i gyi ya gamed do// gas kyi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya ba kyi kyi myongs/ sa kyi rom sa kyin ma ma myong ngo // rnam nas
294a1('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te
294a2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sug ces bya ba 'am gyi sdug ces bya bar gyi spyod na shes rab kyi sa 'o sang tu phyin pa la spyod do// ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag pa'am myi rtag pa'am thing ba'am sdug tu
294a3('bum): ma gags padag myeng pa 'am sdug pa'am kyi mug ci 'gyur ba sa tshu chags pa'i lam yan sag brgyang pa myed do// gas te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myi spong na/ shes rab gyi ma meng na/ 
294a4('bum): zhes bya ba mjug sa shes byabar gyi sna sa rgyan ma pa rnams pan ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces byas gyi
294a5('bum): mges rab kyi la la du phyin pa la myong ngo // gas te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sug ces bya ba bam gyi sreg ces bya bar myi spyong na/ nas sa kyi pha rom du byin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na
294a6('bum): 'am myi rnag pa ba ba drug sul pa 'am bdag las bdag mye pa ga palam gyi thug par gyur bdas tshum migs pa'i bad rnams myed do// marnams snun
294a7('bum): tho mang du phyin pa la spyong // gis de bsas gang rnams can ces bya ba 'am gyi ga ces byab kyi myong / ni kyi ro tu byin pa la spyod ro// gan ge bsam gtan rnams bde nos bya ba 'am
294b1('bum): nam+bu rga sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam gtan rnams dag ces bya ba 'am TI bdag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te bsam rten
294b2('bum): rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug
294b3('bum): pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bsam gtan myed do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams la myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chad myed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar rgya skye
294b4('bum): na/ 'ashes rab kyi pa romang du byin ga la spyod do// 'gal cha myed pa rnams bde nas bya ba'am sdug stsal zhes bya bar myi myong na dashes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la srung rdo/ degal te chang myed/ 
295a1('bum): bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
295a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am stug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
295a3('bum): por 'jug pa myed do// gal te rnam par tha ra pa brgyad la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
295a4('bum): maspyong dzin ma byugal te rnam par tharang pa brgyad bde zhes bya ba 'am su gu snga la zhes bya bar myi smin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // ga te rnam par thar ba brgyad bdag ces bya ba 'am
295a5('bum): skyed ces bya bar myi myong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// stegs chernam par tha te brgyad sreg ces bya ba'am myo sdug ces bya/ bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa ma spyod do/ 
295a6('bum): kyi zhe na/ gsog pa la gyi ga pa 'a me jug sngam pa me ba ga gas pad myed pa ma thun pa'i ma gyi mun par 'gyur bangs tsu rnam ma ma mas cad myed do// gas nyi mtha da kyis gnas
295a7('bum): par 'jug pa dgu la myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi 'osang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa dgu rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod mashes rab kyi ma chomang du phyin pa
295a8('bum): khyong // gags ma kyis rnam pa'i rnams pa nas rgyas pa khrug dum ses rgya gyi myong shes kyis seMng du phyin pa sa myong / sa ma mkharnam pa'ir 'dus
295b1('bum): dgu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
295b2('bum): phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa sku myed
295b3('bum): gal te rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa rtag ces bya
295b4('bum): 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgo da // gal te rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang da smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sbrul zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
295b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa rang sto nang pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag skye ces bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin po sa ru / 
295b6('bum): gas dernam pas pa'i sgo ma ba nyid byed pa nga sanapa myong ba sun ces bya ba la kyi mu ces bya bar myi spyodan/ mang byon pa la tshu kyi byo nan/ gsug pa'amamyonas pa
295b7('bum): ba'am thug sas pa'am bdag gams sa myed pa 'am sug pa 'am gyi mun par 'gyur bar bu ma pa tha pa'i gling pa nyid dang mtshan byed pa dang stod paskyed pa byed do// gal ngon par shes pa rnamams kyi grangs
295b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rogang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams drag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar gyi chung ma zhes rab kyi pha ros du phyinang pa la spyong // gal te mngon par shes pa bde zhes bya ba'am sdug sul zhes bya/ 
296a1('bum): par myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya/ 
296a2('bum): ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mdo/ 
296a3('bum): par shes pa myed do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal
296a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind na/ dmas bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi
296a5('bum): pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzind rnams su gcos hU~M ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang bya la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am / 
296a6('bum): ba'am sdug sngal ba'am bdag gas bdag myed pa'am sdug pa 'am myi stug por 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin myeng ngo // gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myi spyong na zhes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gdungs kyisgo
296a7('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal
296a8('bum): te gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
296b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed do// gal te de bzhin gshes/ 
296b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcul myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu cag ces bya ba'am myi nag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyong ngo // gal te de bzhin
296b3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na
296b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs dpa'i stobs bcu sdug ces bya ba 'am myi stug ces bya bar myi spyod na dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang
296b5('bum): pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i de bzhin/ gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myed do// gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams
296b6('bum): kyi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo do// gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gas te myi 'dzigs pa rnams pade zhes bya ba 'am thun
296b7('bum): sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod ma nes rab kyi pha ma mang tu gyi ning tham myong // ga bye myi 'jigs pa rnams sum
296b8('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug stsal ba'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa'am myi sun
297a1('bum): ga par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myi 'jigs pa rnams myed do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya/ 
297a2('bum): bar myi spyod nashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig
297a3('bum): pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi skyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
297a4('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed/ 
297a5('bum): gal te byams po chen po la myi spyod nas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin dpal spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba'am myi nga ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pa la spyod do// nas
297a6('bum): te byabs pa chen po 'de zhes bya ba 'am sdug sngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba 'am bdog myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
297a7('bum): thal skyong ngo // gal te byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug sbal ba 'am bdag gam bdag
297a8('bum): myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byams po chen po myed do// gal te snying rje chen po la myi spyod ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes/ 
297b1('bum): zag pa'am 'de pa ma thug stsal pa ma 'gags pa nga srung ba yus pa 'as kyi grag par 'gyur bdil gyi mi rkyen brgya ca sa kyi blang sa
297b2('bum): phyin pa la ltung ba/ rgyas kyi rnam la 'dres pa na 'acos bya ba 'am skyen pa ces bya bar gyig rdzang du phyin pas gyung / ma sa
298a1('bum): sdug sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na sa/ 
298a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir
298a3('bum): zho na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thams cad shes pa nyid myed do// 
298a4('bum): gal te kham gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lam gi rnam pa / sa pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bor
298a5('bum): spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal de la ma gi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug pal zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
298a6('bum): kho la spyod do// gal te lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid su
298a7('bum): ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtag pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am bdag gam bdag
298a8('bum): myed pa 'am sdug pa 'am myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
298b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am myi rtag ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am sdug
298b2('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am bdag myed ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
298b3('bum): la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am myi sdug ces bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang rtog pa 'am myi rtag pa 'am bde ba
298b4('bum): 'amo sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bdag gam bdag myed pa 'am/ sdug pa 'am/ myi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de nyid myed do// shes rab/ bam po// rab 'byor
298b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yod sa su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
298b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshor ba yongasasu
298b7('bum): ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
298b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin po de 'du shes ma yin/ 
299a1('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
299a2('bum): na/ 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya
299a3('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa yongasasu ma rdzogs pa gang ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod// 
299a4('bum): gal te myig yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ na/ myig yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myig ma yin/ 
299a5('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir/ 
299a6('bum): zhe na/ rna ba yongs su ma rdzogs sa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sna yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
299a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no zhes bya bar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lci yongs su
299a8('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
299b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lus yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus/ 
299b2('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid yongs su ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
299b3('bum): yid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar spyod na shes rab kyi pha
299b4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te sgra
299b5('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra yongs su te ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no zhes bya bor de ltar yang
299b6('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod do// gal te/ dri yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri yongs su ma
299b7('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin dri yongs su ma yin napa zhes bya ba myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar
299b8('bum): yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te reg yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg yongasu mo rdzogs pa ga/ 
299b9('bum): nyer mi sum rdzogs s+ho zhes byabya kyi spyod shes kyil ro phyi spyo / 
300a1('bum): yin pa de reg ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te chos yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
300a2('bum): la spyod do zhes// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod // gal te myig gi rnam par shes pa
300a3('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de myig gi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin
300a4('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
300a5('bum): na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes phyogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam pa sder shes pa ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa yongs
300a6('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes bya ba de lta
300a7('bum): yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par
300a8('bum): pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so
300b1('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang
300b2('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par
300b3('bum): shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongasu ma rdzog so
300b4('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes bya ba da ltar
300b5('bum): yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongasu ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
300b6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yongasasu rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'du sa te reg pa ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongs
300b7('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba
300b8('bum): de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogaso bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus / 
301a1('bum): reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su rdzogaso zhes/ 
301a2('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
301a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
301a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes/ dab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te myig gi 'dus te regapa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
301a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi 'dus te reg/ pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa ra hU~M/ ga gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang
301a6('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dongade ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
301a7('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa den pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshom pa ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su
301a8('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin/ 
301b1('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de ci'i
301b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
301b3('bum): gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongasu ma
301b4('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod ngo // gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yongasasu
301b5('bum): ma rdzogs po zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyel spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las bya/ nyeng po'i tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus
301b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i cher po ma yin no zhes de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te sa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// 
301b7('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te chu'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes
301b8('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
302a1('bum): la spyod do// gal te mye'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ me'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa/ 
302a2('bum): de mye'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rlung gi khams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 
302a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nam mkha'i khams yongs
302a4('bum): ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yino zhes bya ba de lta
302a5('bum): yang myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs po zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
302a6('bum): na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod// gal te ma rig pa yongs
302a7('bum): ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab
302a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'du byed yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
302b1('bum): 'du byed ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// 
302b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te mying dang gzugs
302b3('bum): yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming dang gzugs yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mying dang gzugs ma yin zhes bya ba de// 
302b4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// skye mched drug yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phri nang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug yongs su mardzon/ 
302b5('bum): ba gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod do// / la te reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes ran
302b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// / 
302b7('bum): gal te tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
302b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te sred pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma
303a1('bum): yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te len pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhen// 
303a2('bum): len pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te srid pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
303a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te skye ba yongasu ma rdzog so zhes
303a4('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te/ 
303a5('bum): rga shi yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi yod su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar ya
303a6('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal tos na pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi snad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa 'i
303a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
303a8('bum): yongs su ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 
303b1('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
303b2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ga
303b3('bum): te brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang
303b4('bum): yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya/ de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la do// gal te bsam nyan gi pha lang tu phyin pa yongs su ma chog
303b5('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha'i mang tu phyin pa stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam tan gi pha rolang tu d+hi pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de bsam rtan gi pha rol
303b6('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol
303b7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
303b8('bum): ralang tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin/ 
304a1('bum): pa de nang stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te phyi stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi/ 
304a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid yosu
304a3('bum): ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de ci'i phyir zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid yin zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
304a4('bum): ma myong // gas te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myo na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ so na pastong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid stos
304a5('bum): nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la stong // gal te chen po stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs zhes bya baspyod na shes rab kyi pha rilang tu phyin pa la spyod do// ci'i phyir zhen/ chan
304a6('bum): stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa chen po stong pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te don pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
304a7('bum): rgya phyin pa la snyed/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ don dupa stong pa nyid yongasu sa rdzogs pa glang yin pa ngon rim pa stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de lta'i gyi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te 'dus gyis stong pa nyid songs
304a8('bum): rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha'i mang tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin ni zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi/ 
304a9('bum): ro lang tu phyin pa la spong gims te 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su martogs so nas bya bar gyi myongs shes ras kyi pha rol tu byed pa la byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'dus ma byas snying pa ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang mim // 
304b1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa snod
304b2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe nan mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thog dang tha ma myed pa/ 
304b3('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma myang ba stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin
304b4('bum): zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dor ba myeng pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngor ba myeng ba song / 
304b5('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yon na zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'o// spyod// gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogaso zhes bya ba
304b6('bum): myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzhin stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang bzhin ste/ nga pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
304b7('bum): phyinang bra la spyod do// gral te chos thams cad stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa chos
304b8('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod do// gal te rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
304b9('bum): ba la spyod de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te myi dmyigs pa/ 
305a1('bum): stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de myi dmyigs pa stong pa
305a2('bum): nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de tsa
305a3('bum): phyir zhen na rangs pa snying bu stong pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ngos po srung du stong pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi stong na shes rab kyi pha lu tu phyin pa la stong // gas te po zhid stong pa nyid mo
305a4('bum): ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong / de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs pa go// yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi sto/ 
305a5('bum): na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// gal te dngos po med pa'i/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myed gi/ 
305a6('bum): dngongo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi stod do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodado// gal te dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnas yongasu rdzog
305a7('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi
305a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te yang dag par spong ba rnas yongasu ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pashang
305a9('bum): yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnas ma yino zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// gal te rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnas yongasu ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
305b1('bum): ba la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnas ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal
305b2('bum): dbang po rnas yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rjes yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams mo yino zhes bya ba das
305b3('bum): yang myi snad na shes rab kyi pha ro sa tu phyin pa la stong ngo // gal te stobs rnams yongasu ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha ro mang du phyin pa la spyod// ba'i phyir zhe na/ stobs nas yongs su
305b4('bum): yin bas rnams sa 'inas bya sa shes rabakyi pa mang tu phyin pas spyo// sa kyang chub kyi yan lag nas yong su ma rdzog sos bya bar mi spyong sa gsar gyi ma 'o ma du byan
305b5('bum): la mang kyi phyir zhen/ byang chub kyi yan laganams songs suMgs pa gang yin pa de d+hA chu kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ sa de ltar yang myi sung na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sung / 
305b6('bum): thul 'phags pa'i lam sen lag brgyad pa yongs su mchogs zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha ral tu zin pa la seMnade ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa yang sum
305b7('bum): rdzogs cha glang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lum yan lag brgyad pa yin no zhes bya bar myi spong ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// sbrul te 'phags pa'i bangan pa rnas yongs su ma rdzog sa zhes bya bar myi rmo/ 
305b8('bum): sa rab kyi phyi gye tu phyin pa ma s+ya / kyi'i phyir te ma/ thamags pa'i bden pa rnams ma su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bangon pa rnam ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi sung na shes rab kyi pha
306a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te tshad myed pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad myed pa rnams yong su ma rdzogs pa gang yin
306a2('bum): ba de tshad myed pa rnas ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs myeng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yong su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes
306a3('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pA la spyod de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs myed pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs myed pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod / 
306a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal te rna par thar po rgyasos su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su
306a5('bum): rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa brgyad ma yin zhes byade ltar yang sti stong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ngo // gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu mangs
306a6('bum): ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sdom da de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug chu yang su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa ma thar kyis gnas pa / 
306b1('bum): sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do ba'i phyir nan/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa mngon par shes pa rnams su yin zhes bya bar du ltar yang myi stong shes rab kyi
306b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal ta ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa ga
306b3('bum): yin pa de ti nga 'dzin rnams ma yin zhes bya ba ltar yang myi sbying na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// gal te gzungs kyi sgo rnams yong su ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi myangan shes rab kyi pha rol tu
306b4('bum): byin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yosu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang sti spyong ma shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la mya sto
306b5('bum): grol te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su ma rdzog zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa su yongs pa
306b6('bum): rdzogs ma gang yin du ridri bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pan ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha romang tu phyin pa la snyid / gal myi 'jigs pa pa'i yongs su su rdzogs so zhes bya
306b7('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi 'jigs bya ba'i yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi
306b8('bum): ril tu phyin pa la spyo// gal teso so yang dag par rig po rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa
307a1('bum): rnams yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gal te byams pa chen po yongs/ 
307a2('bum): ma rdzogaso zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byams po chen po yongs su mi rdzogs pa gang yin pa de byams pa chen po ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar myi spyod/ 
307a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong ngo // gal te maung rje chen po yang su ma rdzogs zhes bya bar myi stongs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod// ci'i phyi zhen/ snying rje chen pa yong su ma rdzogs
307a4('bum): yin pa de snying rje chen po ya su ma rdzog ma yin no// zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// / me la te sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu ma rdzogs
307a5('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
307a6('bum): ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te thams cad shes pa nyid yongasu ma rdzog so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 
307a7('bum): thams cad thos pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin ni nas d+ha ba de ltar yang kyi song ni shes rab kyi pha mang tu phyin pa la spyong ngo // gal te lam gyi rnas pa gos pa nyid yongasu su rdzogs
307a8('bum): zhes bya bar gyi spyo na shes rab kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid mos su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de las shi shes pa nyi ma yin ni zhes bya ba'i myi slong sa shes rab kyi ma
307b1('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod do// gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongasu ma rdzogs pa/ 
307b2('bum): gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
307b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'ang ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
307b4('bum): rab 'byor de de de bzhin ni de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / 
307b5('bum): ma chags pa legs par bstan to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nye pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
307b6('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de
307b7('bum): dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal hU~M 'du shes chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// gal te 'dra
307b8('bum): byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong na ni ci rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong sa
308a1('bum): bag gshes ras sti pha rolang du phyinang pa la stong ngo legs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ gal te myig nagasu pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stong de shes
308a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snum
308a3('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi yi'i lod tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
308a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod 'apa'i tshe/ gal te lus chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
308a5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhenyes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags
308a6('bum): pa 'am ma chagos pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sgra chags pa 'am ma chag pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
308a7('bum): tu phyin pa sa spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu tund pa la spyong ba na// d+hI d+hi chags pa 'am chags pa zhus bya bar myi sbyongs nas rab kyi pha ro sa du phyin pa la stong ngo zhes rab kyi pha 'i mang tu byan
308a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gol 'chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te reg chags pa'am chags pa zhes
308b1('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// 
308b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi rna bar shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod do de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
308b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sde'i
308b4('bum): rna bar shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i rna bar shes pa chags pa na/ 
308b5('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ke la spyod do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
308b6('bum): par myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod dede shes rabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi rna bar shes pa chags pa 'am chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol
308b7('bum): tu phyi nang pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod// de shes rab kyi
308b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
309a1('bum): ma gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyong ba'i sho gal te lce'i 'dus te zhen
309a2('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi sring na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ding shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te rag pa chags pa'o ma chags pa
309a3('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyin pa la spyod dor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spong na shes
309a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod 'ang shes rab kyi pha rol su ngan pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba 'dang chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi srid ni shes
309a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal ta rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la sa byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya ba
309a6('bum): myi skyed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar
309a7('bum): myi spyod sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi
309a8('bum): spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi
309b1('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la stong pa'i tshe/ gral te yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags bya zhes bya/ 
309b2('bum): bAr myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang po la spod ngo do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal ta sa'i khams chags chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
309b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinod pa la stong pa'i tshe/ gal te chu'i khams chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes
309b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mya'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha/ rol du tu phyind pa la spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang/ 
309b5('bum): pab la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rlung gi khams chags pa 'am maHchags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
309b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te nam mkha'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshed
309b7('bum): gal te rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gol te ma
309b8('bum): rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi ba rel tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i med gal te 'du byad tshogs pa 'am ma chags pa/ 
310a1('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes// 
310a2('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mying dang gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab
310a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye mched drug chags pa 'am mi chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod do// 
310a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dag pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyong na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod dode shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags / zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sred du/ 
310a6('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la smre ra pa'i tshe/ gal te len pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bas/ 
310a7('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te srid pa chags pa 'a mi chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma skye
310a8('bum): de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong pa'i tshe
310b1('bum): gal te rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa 'a zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha ro 'od tu phyinang pa la skyed de ngo shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa rnga gas
310b2('bum): pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi stong na shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa chagus pa'i mchashes bye
310b3('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ gal te bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bA ben+da
310b4('bum): myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te brtson 'gru/ ras kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhe
