310b5('bum): bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te sam rtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa/ 
310b6('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyin pa la spyod de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu ston pa la stong pa'i tshe/ g.ye te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes smra
310b7('bum): rkyer myi spyod na dgos rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa lo spyod// de shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa la skyed po'i che/ gam nyinang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya bar myi stong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu 'i
310b8('bum): pa la suM dza shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ gas te gyi stong pa nyid tshogs pa' ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong rdo rje rab kyi snga rab tu phyin pa la sa
311a1('bum): gal te phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags
311a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pharo kyang du phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol nyu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod do// 
311a3('bum): deshes rab kyi la ri mang tu byind pa la spyod pa'i cha gal te don dam pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar gyi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha ro lang du byi nang pa la spyod do// deshes rab kyi pha rolang tu byin tha ma spyod pa'i tshe/ 
311a4('bum): gal te 'dus byas stob pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar gyi nga spyod na zhes rab kyi pha rom du phyin pa la spyod ngo do// de zhes rab kyi saderosang du byi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'dus kyis stong ba zhing man
311a5('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi
311a6('bum): spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thog ma dang ma myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// 
311a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
311a8('bum): gal te rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na// shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshogs pa 'am/ 
311b1('bum): khrims kyi da byin pa la spyod do// gas pa kyi rol tu mye dpe la byung ba'i/ te yang pa sa sa na \u0f7f mas canas pams sbyin phyi la / 
311b2('bum): la kyi ma byid pa rdzu mamams pa rnapa sa stan/ / 
312a1('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa/ 
312a2('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na
312a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
312a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te bsam rten rnams ro led tu phyin chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
312a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa/ zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs
312a6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad chag
312a7('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi sbyong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu chags pa 'am ma chags
312a8('bum): pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa chags pa 'am ma chags
312b1('bum): zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha
312b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
312b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzungs gi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te de bzhin
312b4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar dmyi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te myi 'jigs pa bzhi chags
312b5('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi na pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'i tshe/ gal te so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma
312b6('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar myi sbyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ched/ gal te byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyong na/ 
312b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyed
312b8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ gal sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi
313a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te thams cad shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
313a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ gal te lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te rnam pa thos
313a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar myi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de shes rab byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na gzugs chags pa 'am/ 
313a4('bum): ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// tshor ba chags pa 'am mchags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'du shes chags/ pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'du byed chags
313a5('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myeng ngo do/ na
313a6('bum): ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sna chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lce chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lus chags pa 'am mtshas
313a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// yid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sgra chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
313a8('bum): shes pa myed do// dri chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ro chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// reg chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// chos chags
313b1('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma tshugs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 
313b2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lus gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes
313b3('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// yid gi rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chags
313b4('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do lus kyi
313b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mye sad do// yang gi 'dus te reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes/ bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
313b6('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba cha
313b7('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags
313b8('bum): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// chu'i khams chags
314a1('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// me'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rlung gi khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// nam kha'i
314a2('bum): khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ma rig pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
314a3('bum): 'du byed chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ mying dang gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 
314a4('bum): skye mched drug chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// reg pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// da tshor ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed/ 
314a5('bum): sred pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// len pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sri dab chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 
314a6('bum): skye ba chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ rga shi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed/ 
314a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
314a8('bum): pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhe/ 
314b1('bum): bya bar 'du shes pa med do// nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma mags
314b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ don ngas pa stong pani
314b3('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
314b4('bum): shes pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// dor ba skyed
314b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma
314b6('bum): chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa sto nga pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mye'o// 
314b7('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid chags pa
314b8('bum): 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams chags pa 'am ma chags par 'du shes pa myed do// 
315a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// dbang po rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// stobs rnams chags pa 'am ma chags/ 
315a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// 'phags pa'i kham yan lag brgyad pa chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
315a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags par 'du shes pa myed do// bsam rten rnams chags pa 'am ma chags par mngon par chags pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya
315a4('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna mas chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ rnam par thar pa brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du
315a5('bum): shes pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu cha gas pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa
315a6('bum): chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
315a7('bum): pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi chag/ 
315a8('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// byams pa chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed
315b1('bum): snying rje chen po chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags
315b2('bum): pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya/ 
315b3('bum): bar 'du shes pa myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am ma tshogs pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// rang byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
315b4('bum): pa'i byang chub chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa myed do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyi nga yongasu myi 'grib ma bstan kyang yongasu myi 'grib bstan kyang mi/ 
315b5('bum): 'phel ma bstan kyang myi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das/ kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongasu myi 'grib ma bstan kyang
315b6('bum): yongs su myi 'grib bstan kyang myi 'phel ma bstan kyang ma 'phe lo/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing
315b7('bum): nam mkha'i legs pa 'am ma legs pa brjod kyang nam mkha'i legs pa yongs su 'grib pa myed do/ nyes pa brjod kyang yongasu 'grib pa myed do// nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed nyes pa brjo
315b8('bum): kyang 'phel ba myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba myed do// nyes pa brjod kyang yong su 'grib pa myed do// legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed do// nyes
316a1('bum): pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
316a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe/ zhum pa dang g.yeng bar myi 'gyur ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson
316a3('bum): par bgyid cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar myi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
316a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' sgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// 'du shes ma mchis/ 'du byed ma mchis// rnam par shes pa mchis
316a5('bum): nam mkha' la ni myig ma mchis so// rna ba ma mchis so// sna ma ma// ches so lce ma mchis so// lus ma mchi sa yid ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis// sgra ma mchis so/ 
316a6('bum): dri ma mchis so// ro ma mchis so reg ma mchis so// chos ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// rnaba'i rnam par shes pa ma mchi so sna'i rnam par shes pa mchis
316a7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ma mchis// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis// yid gi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// 
316a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis/ nam mkha' la ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsho
316b1('bum): ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor po ma mchis so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te/ 
316b2('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sa'i khams ma mchis// chu'i khams ma mchis// me'i khams ma mchi so rlung gi khas
316b3('bum): ma mchis so// nam mkha'i khams ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma mchis// nam mkha' la ni ma rig pa ma mchis so// 'du byed ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa ma mchiso// mying dang gzugs ma
316b4('bum): mchis so// skye mched drug ma mchis so// reg pa ma mchis so// tshor ba ma mchis so// sred pa ma mchis so// len pa ma mchis/ srid pa ma mchis// skye ba ma mchis rga shi ma mchis// nam
316b5('bum): mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis// tshul khrim nyes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
316b6('bum): ma mchis so// bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid ma mchis// phyi nang stong pa nyid ma
316b7('bum): mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid ma mchis// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma mchis// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma mchis// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma mchi so mtha' las 'das
316b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan
317a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma mchis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma mchis// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis// nam
317a2('bum): mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis// yang dag par spong ba rnams ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa ma mchis// dbang po rnams ma mchis// stobs rnams ma mchis// byang chub kyi yan
317a3('bum): lag rnams ma mchis// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma mchis// bsam rten rnams ma mchis// tshad med pa rnams ma mchis// gzugs myed pa'i/ 
317a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma mchis so// rnam par thar pa brgyad ma mchis so// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ma mchis so// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa ma mchis/ 
317a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis// ting nge 'dzin rnams ma ma chos so// gzungs gi sgo rnams ma mchis// nam mkha' na/ ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma mchis/ myi 'jigs
317a6('bum): pa bzhi ma mchis// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ma mchis so// byams pa chen po ma mchis// snying rje chen po ma mchis// sangs rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis// nam mkha'
317a7('bum): ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchiso// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma mchis/ dgra bcom pa nyid ma mchis// rang byang chub ma mchis/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
317a8('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis// / bam po// / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'chal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa/ 
317b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'i don du brtson pa mos par 'bad pa mos par rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams gi slad du go cha 'tshal
317b2('bum): ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su 'tshal zhing yongasu grol bar 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go cha
317b3('bum): 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams gi go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la 'deg par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can
317b4('bum): rnams gi slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
317b5('bum): gang sems can rnams gi slad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha 'tshal ba'o// btso/ ma ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga
317b6('bum): nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams gi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni dpe'o bsam gis myi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i
317b7('bum): cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe ma/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gi stong chen po 'jig rten gi khams 'di lta ste/ dper na 'das bu'i tshal lam bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smyig ma'i tshal lam 'bras
317b8('bum): gi zhing ngam til gi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ma pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs
318a1('bum): pa re res kyang sems can tshad med grangs ma mchis pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan 'das sems can gi khams la ni bri ba 'am gang ba myi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis
318a2('bum): pa dang sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re res 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste dper na 'dam bu'i tshul lam bu ram shing gi tshal lam smyig ma'i
318a3('bum): tshal 'bras gi zhing ngam til gi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi skal ba 'am skal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
318a4('bum): re res chos bstan pa yongasu mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gi khams ni 'grib pa 'am gang ba myi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das
318a5('bum): rnam grangs des na bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams gi slad du/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog/ sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongasu smin par bgyi
318a6('bum): bar 'tshal zhing yongasu grol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes 'tshalo de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang med la tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod
318a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gi phung po yang yod/ shes rab kyi phung po yang yod/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod phyir mi
318a8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang yod/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang byang chub kyang yod/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang yod lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang yod phyir myi 'ong ba yang yod/ 
318b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid kyang yod/ rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos dkon mchog kyang yod dge 'dun
318b2('bum): dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos gi 'khor lo skor ba yang yod pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshalo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces/ 
318b3('bum): smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gas smras pa ke'u
318b4('bum): ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
318b5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par// bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis srung ba dang / 
318b6('bum): bskyang ba dang bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjesu mtho nga ngam/ smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la srung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rje su mthong ngam/ rab
318b7('bum): 'byor kyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la gnas na de nyid de'i srung ba dang / bskyang ba dang bskyab par 'gyur// gal te ji skad du
318b8('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar 'gyur na de la myi dang mi ma yin pa klags tshol ba rnams kyis klags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi gnas pa de'i
319a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs gi bu mo de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
319a2('bum): spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' srung ba dang / bskyed pa dang bskyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar ma 'grub cing dub pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur
319a3('bum): kro'u sha~M ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / myig yor dang / sprul pa dang bsrung ba dang bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sem brgya byin gis smras
319a4('bum): po btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus so// smras pa ke'u shi ka de ba dezhin du byang chub sems dpe'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi/ de pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang
319a5('bum): bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gis smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ni myi nus/ smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
319a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa mi grub cing deb pa'i skal pa can du 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems khyod
319a7('bum): kyis chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la srung ba dang bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'tsho
319a8('bum): de ni myi nus/ smras pa ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phra rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyed pa dang bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam
319b1('bum): pa ltar mi grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di ska ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems pa/ 
319b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smyig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brtson lta bu dang / myig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i
319b3('bum): chos rnams yongasu shes pa dang / de ltar yongasu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi lam rlom sem su myi byed/ rmel ma gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmyi lam mdzem
319b4('bum): semasu mya byed/ sgyu ma rlom semasu myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed/ spros rgyu rlom semasasu myi byed smyig rgyus rlom sem su myi/ 
319b5('bum): byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sem su myi byed/ sgra brnyan rlom sernams su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ smre brnyan la rlom sem su myi byed/ myig mar rlom sa
319b6('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su mi byed/ myig yor la rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pa rlornam semasu mi byed/ sbrum gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems
319b7('bum): khyed myi byed/ rab 'byor nga gis smras pa ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rlom semasu myi byed
319b8('bum): gzugs kyis rlom semasu myi byed/ gzugs la rlom semasu mi byed/ de rmi lam rlom sem su mi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom semasu mi byed / rmi lam la rlom semasu myi byed// 
320a1('bum): la/ marlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sbrum la zlom sems su su byed do// de smig tu rlom sems su mi byed/ smig chus rlom sems su mi byed/ smyig rgyul rlom sems su mi byed / 
320a2('bum): sgra brnyan rnam sems su mi byed/ sna brnyan gis rlom sems su mya byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig yor rnam sems su mi byed / myig yong gis rnam sems su mi byed/ myig yor la rnam sems kyi
320a3('bum): byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo sna
320a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ tshor ba rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor bas rlom sems su myi byed/ tshor ba yi rlom sems su myi byed/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mya byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom semasu myi nga
320a5('bum): de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra/ ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi bye// smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom semasasu myi byed do// 
320a6('bum): de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom semasu myi byed/ myig yar la rlom sems su myi byed do// 
320a7('bum): de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed / sprul pas rlom semasu myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// kau'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du shes rnaMm
320a8('bum): sems su myi byed/ 'dugs gis rnam sems su myi byed/ 'du gas la rnam sems su su byed/ de rlol ma rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi myong ngo // de sgyu ma rnam sem su myi byed/ 
320b1('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed te sgra brnyan gis rlom seM/ 
320b2('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom semasasu myi byed do/ de sprul pa rlom semasasu myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed sprul pa la rlom sos
320b3('bum): su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'du byed rlom sems su myi byed/ 'du byed kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ 'du byed la rlom semasu mi bye na/ de rmi
320b4('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi la ma la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom semasasu myi byed do// de smyig
320b5('bum): rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi bya// sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom semasu myi byed
320b6('bum): nga/ ngo myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yo rigs rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom semasasu myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom semasasu myi byed
320b7('bum): ko'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par shes pa rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlom sems su myi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sos
320b8('bum): su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom semasasu myi byed/ rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed na/ rmi lam la rlom sem su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom semasasu myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig
321a1('bum): rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed sgra brnyan la rlom sems su/ 
321a2('bum): myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sem su myi byed/ de sprul pa rlom semasu myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed sprul pa la rlom sa su myi byed de/ 
321a3('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig rlom sems su myi byed/ myig gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig la rlom sems su myi byed de/ demi
321a4('bum): lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi/ byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sem sa su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sos
321a5('bum): su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su mi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom semasu myi byed/ 
321a6('bum): sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig ya rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su mi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom semasu mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su/ 
321a7('bum): myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdza bo rlom sems su myi byed/ rna bas rlom sems su myi byed/ 
321a8('bum): rna ba la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu mas rlom semasu myi byed/ sgyu ma
321b1('bum): rlom sems su mi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sem su myi byed/ sgra brnyan
321b2('bum): la rlom sems su myi byed do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su mi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ 
321b3('bum): sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sna rlom sems su myi byed/ snas rlom sems su myi byed sna la rlom sos
321b4('bum): su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlo/ ma sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sos
321b5('bum): su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rla ma sems su myi byed/ smyug rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gas rlom sems su myi
321b6('bum): byed/ sgra brnyan lo rlom sems su myi bya'o// de myig yar rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom
321b7('bum): sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lce rlom sems su myi byed lces rlom sems su
321b8('bum): myi byed/ lho lo rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// ri sgyu ma rlom sem su myi byed/ skyo mas rlom semasu myi byed/ 
322a1('bum): sgyu ma la rlom sems su mya byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom sems su mi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom so/ 
322a2('bum): su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do/ de myig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa/ 
322a3('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus rlom sems su myi byed/ lus gis
322a4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ lus la rlom sems su myi byang na/ de rmi lam/ rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ 
322a5('bum): sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu sa rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do/ de sgra brnyan rlom sems
322a6('bum): su myi byed sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed de/ de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor rigs rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom
322a7('bum): sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yid rlom sos/ 
322a8('bum): su myi byed/ yong gis rlom sems su myi byed/ yid la/ rlom sems su myi byed/ de rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi phyin
322b1('bum): sgyu mes rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su mi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi/ 
322b2('bum): rkye du sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed// de myig yor rlom sems su mi byed/ myig yor gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom
322b3('bum): sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs
322b4('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ degazugs la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems da su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sem su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom
322b5('bum): sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlo ma sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smyig rgyu rlom sems su mi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su myi nang khyo rgyu chu
322b6('bum): byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi byed do// dmyig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig
322b7('bum): po ma rnam sems su myi byad do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rnam sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chem
322b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ sgra rlom sems su mi byed/ sgras rnam sems su myi byed/ sgro la rlom sems su myi byeng no// de rmi la ma rnam sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems myi
323a1('bum): mi lam la rnam sems su myi byed do/ de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rnam sems su myi bying // de smyig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyus rlom sems su/

333a2('bum): myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rnam sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed // ke/ 'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
333a3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ sred ba rlom sems su myi byed/ sred pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sred pa la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rnam sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su mya byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su
333a4('bum): myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su mi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sem sa su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyu la rlom
333a5('bum): sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sems su myi skye/ do// de myig yor rlom sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sos
333a6('bum): su myi byed/ myig yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

338a1('bum): ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gis rlom semasu myi byed 'dus ma byas s+ho/ 
338a2('bum): pa nyid la rlom sems su myi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed sgyu ma la rlom sems
338a3('bum): su myi byed do// de smig rgyu rlom sems su myi byed/ smig rgyus rlom sems su myi byed/ smyig rgyu la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgra brnyan rlom sems su myi byed/ sgra brnyan gis rlom sem su myi byed/ sgra brnyan la rlom sem su myi byed do//

338b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rlom sems su myi byed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ thogs dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyi
338b2('bum): la rnam sems su myi byed na nide rmi lam rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam gis rlom sems su myi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sgyu ma rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu mas rlom sems su myi byed/ sgyu ma la rlom sems su mi byed/

338b4('bum): sems su myi byed/ myig yor gis rlom sems su myi byed/ myig dang yor la rlom sems su myi byed do// de sprul pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su myi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su myi byed do// ke'u shi ka gas
